values: yep yep. i finally got this one posted. click at the bottom to download as usual. Just Tiny Little Rocks come quick catch me while im still breathing and ill draw more than just breath youre sick hugging porcelain, heaving life hurts more than death and you walk and you block out but your life is in lock down and your body;s a knockout so who can you mock now? youre gone so call me awful leaving write a note on my door im wrong so make it easy make it how it was before. well ive sucked every bit of this cigarette to the filter i wonder if this one will kill her i cant say that im wrong until shes proven that shes right CLICK HERE to download "just tiny little rocks" by brandon lynch

tonights bruises from fighting's first practice with our new drummer eric. im kinda nervous to be honest. if this new drummer doesnt work out im not sure if bruises from fighting will exist anymore. it just doesnt make sense for me to keep recording these songs without a band or a hope of playing them live with a band. who knows maybe ill go solo and just see what i can pull off. i definitely need to get better at guitar first. either way i hope this works out because if it does at all i think itll be really good. no songs right this second but i think ill post sometime soon. i gotta go reserve a practice room too. goddammit berklee why do you suck?

this ones called "exactly what you want." at least for now. another song i havent come up with a solid name for. im in need of a new acoustic quite badly right now. mine just sounds weird all the time now. exactly what you want. its a slideshow yknow the snapshots come and go some fade and some just change but the differences remain theres you changing your tune on the measure you thought i forgot to seperate the me and the you and thats exactly what you want these pictures cant prove anything but a life i wish you lead theres me hating the scene where they took what i called mine break off a piece of me while i stumble down the finest line i know i cant change anything but the way i spend my time. CLICK HERE to download "exactly what you want" by Brandon Lynch

this is a new one. im really not sure what to call it at all. its painfully obvious what this is all about really. theres not much to be said about it that isnt being said in the lyrics so ill just post em and at the bottom will be a link to download the rough acoustic version if you wanna hear what it sounds like at this point. enjoy. fear and loathing in back bay here you go steph your name in a song by the time you hear it i may be gone reminiscent of times way back when you didnt wanna hear about those others anymore and i said is it just me or do we fit? well its probably just me. and you said what is wrong with us? well its probably just me. so tonight ill make candy shots and ill savor every taste that gets you out of my mouth. cuz i cant touch anything without your fingerprints on it and im screaming just to get your voice out of my head. and i said what is wrong with us? well its probably just me. and i said is it just me or do we fit? well its probably just me. and when i wake up ill just sleep the other way my heads gone south just like our fate. can we make up? can you stare me in the face tell me everythings ok? here you go steph our fate in a song by the time you play it ill probably be gone well you wrote it for me. you dictated every step and all i did was copy it down click here to download "fear and loathing in back bay" by Brandon Lynch

Im keeping this Blog for the purposes of watching my songwriting get better and also sharing it with anyone who cares enough to listen. ill be posting lyrics and stories and links to downloads and updates on my bands myspace.  as my first entry im just going to kind of talk about where im at a little bit. not because i assume people would wonder. its for my own interest so when i look back i can see the patterns in my own behavior etc.

im studying to be an applecare technician. which is actually what i should be doing right now. 
i just recently decided to stop going to berklee college of music full time. it didnt leave me with enough time to write songs. i plan on going part time in the summers.
im having girfriend issues. always a songwriters best and worst position to be in.

thats about it though for now. next post will be the first song entry.
